Sentencas: The different alkali metal substitution strategies of the strontium meta-silicate based ion conductors have been enormously cross-examined to synthesize cost-effective novel electrolyte for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Influence of K+ substitution on germanium doped strontium silicate (Sr3-3xK3xSi3-3yGe3yO9-δ; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.20, y=0.1) for application as solid electrolyte

Sentencas: In the present investigation, crystal structure, phase formation, microstructure, total conductivity and stability of the Potassium and Germanium incorporated Sr3Si3O9 based system, Sr3-3xK3xSi3-3yGe3yO9-delta (0 <= x <= 0.20, y = 0.1), is examined for their application as solid electrolyte for electrochemical devices such as ITSOFCs.
Titulo: Influence of K+ substitution on germanium doped strontium silicate (Sr3-3xK3xSi3-3yGe3yO9-δ; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.20, y=0.1) for application as solid electrolyte

Sentencas: These samples have been made via solid state reaction route.
Titulo: Influence of K+ substitution on germanium doped strontium silicate (Sr3-3xK3xSi3-3yGe3yO9-δ; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.20, y=0.1) for application as solid electrolyte

Sentencas: X-ray Rietveld refinement method was used for the structural investigation.
Titulo: Influence of K+ substitution on germanium doped strontium silicate (Sr3-3xK3xSi3-3yGe3yO9-δ; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.20, y=0.1) for application as solid electrolyte

Sentencas: Raman and FT-IR spectroscopy were performed to examine the phase formation and absorption of light by the bonds of vibrating molecules to provide molecular characteristics and vibrational modes of the molecules.
Titulo: Influence of K+ substitution on germanium doped strontium silicate (Sr3-3xK3xSi3-3yGe3yO9-δ; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.20, y=0.1) for application as solid electrolyte

Sentencas: The X-ray Photoelectron Spectroscopy study was used to validate the characteristic valence states of the constituting elements.
Titulo: Influence of K+ substitution on germanium doped strontium silicate (Sr3-3xK3xSi3-3yGe3yO9-δ; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.20, y=0.1) for application as solid electrolyte

Sentencas: Thermo-gravimetric analysis was performed to inspect the thermal stability and weight changes in the compounds during heating process.
Titulo: Influence of K+ substitution on germanium doped strontium silicate (Sr3-3xK3xSi3-3yGe3yO9-δ; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.20, y=0.1) for application as solid electrolyte

Sentencas: In the SEM and EDS mapping, an amorphous phase of K2Si2O5 can be visualized which seems to segregate along grain boundaries and this amorphous complexion augmented with K+ dopant concentration.
Titulo: Influence of K+ substitution on germanium doped strontium silicate (Sr3-3xK3xSi3-3yGe3yO9-δ; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.20, y=0.1) for application as solid electrolyte

Sentencas: AC Electrical impedance spectroscopy studies suggest that the ionic conduction in Sr3-3xK3xSi3-3yGe3yO9-delta could be from the oxide ions along with mobility of K+ ions of the glassy phase.
Titulo: Influence of K+ substitution on germanium doped strontium silicate (Sr3-3xK3xSi3-3yGe3yO9-δ; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.20, y=0.1) for application as solid electrolyte

Sentencas: In this study, we also tried to get the optimal doping condition with compositions to minimize numerous concern of the system.
